fields.name: morph_prod/24

fields.name: syll_manip/12
fields.title: Syllable manipulation
fields.description: A pooled score taken from the subtests syllable addition, syllable deletion, syllable manipulation of the METAPHON test. Out of 12.

fields.title: Phoneme manipulation
fields.description: A pooled score taken from the subtests phoneme addition, phoneme deletion of the METAPHON test. Out of 8.

name: language-wm-data
title: language and working memory data
description: This dataset contains the working memory and language data of my PhD project. Data was collected between January and July 2020 from private and public nursery schools and primary schools. Participants were aged between 5;6 and 6;6 at the time of the collection. Access to schools was given by the Institute of Educational Policy (Ministry of Education) and parental consent was obtained.
